name: calcom-block
description: Cal.com integration block for seamless appointment scheduling. Features multiple layouts, customizable content, and full Cal.com embed support with themes and event types.
author: PayloadKit
features: Full Cal.com integration with iframe embedding
Support for specific event types and general booking pages
4 calendar height options: small, medium, large, auto
Rich header content: eyebrow, title, subtitle, description
Feature list with 8 Lucide React icons
Flexible background options: color, gradient, image, none
Text color theming: dark, light, primary
usage: Perfect for service providers, consultants, coaches, agencies, and any business that needs professional appointment scheduling integrated directly into their PayloadCMS website.

preview.description: Cal.com scheduling block with content and calendar

setup.dependencies: Make sure you have Lucide React and Tailwind CSS configured in your project.
setup.components: This block uses the blocks-shared registry components. Make sure to install them first: payloadkit add blocks-shared
setup.calcom: You'll need a Cal.com account and username. Set up your event types in your Cal.com dashboard before using this component.
